Spells:
Acid Splash (W0 Conj): R60' Ranged touch inflicts 4d6 HP acid (Dex neg)
Arcane Lock (W2 Abju): Touched barrier becomes passable only by designated creatures
Chain Lightning (W6 Evoc): R150' 4 targets in 30' radius suffer 10d8 HP lightning (Dex half)
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Clairvoyance (W3 Divi): R1 mile Self sees or hears remotely through invisible sensor for conc or 10 min
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force, dusts if reduced to 0 HP (Dex neg)
Fly (W3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed for conc or 10 min
Forcecage (W7 Evoc): R100' Creates 20' barred cube or 10' solid box for 1 hr
Greater Invisibility (W4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc or 1 min
Hellish Rebuke (K1 Evoc): R60' Use Reaction to inflict 2d10 HP fire on successful attacker (Dex half)
Identify (W1 Divi): Self determines magic properties or spells affecting touched
Legend Lore (W5 Divi): Self learns info about named person, place, or object
Mage Armor (W1 Abju): Touched gains AC 13 + DexMod in no armor for 8 hr
Mage Hand (K0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Magic Mouth (W2 Illu): R30' Object speaks 25-word message when triggered
Maze (W8 Conj): R60' Target sent to labyrinthine demiplane (DC 20 Int escapes) for conc or 10 min
Melf's Acid Arrow (W2 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 4d4 HP acid, 2d4 HP next rd (miss half 1st rd, 0 HP 2nd)
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum (W4 Abju): R120' Protects 100' sq from sound, vision, divination, teleportation, and planar travel for 1 dy
Mordenkainen's Sword (W7 Evoc): R60' Self controls force weapon (melee spell attack inflicts 3d10 HP force, moves 20'/rd) for conc or 1 min
Planar Binding (W5 Abju): R60' Binds outsider to service (Cha neg) for 1 dy
Prestidigitation (W0 Tran): R10' Self performs minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (W1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead, and those creatures suffer Disadv on attack on touched
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius causes retching for conc or 1 min
Stone Shape (W4 Tran): Reshapes touched medium-sized stone
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates permanent portal to similar circle
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3'-diameter x 1 inch thick force disk follows, holds 500 lbs at 3' for 1 hr
True Polymorph (W9 Tran): R30' Transforms target creature or object (Wis neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
True Strike (K0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd

Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Know 2 K0 spells, cast 1 K1 spell/long rest
Arcane Recovery: Short rest recovers 10 spell slot levels 1/dy
Blood Channeling: When casting, take 1d10 HP necrotic per 50 GP to forego material components
Bond Of Mutual Suffering: Use Reaction to inflict equal damage on attacker 2/short rest
Flash Recall: Swap prepared spell 1/short rest
Glyph Of Hemorrhaging: May curse successful spell attack target to suffer +1d6 HP necrotic from each attack for 1 min (Con ends)
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Sanguine Burst: May take spell level HP necrotic to reroll 1 spell damage dice
Signature Spells: Cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Spell Mastery: Cast chosen W1 spell and W2 spell at will
Thicker Than Water: Resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage during spell concentration
